subject: NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: It’s easy to fit the 12th-seeded Rams into the narrative of the plucky underdog, but in terms of facilities and money raised, they more closely resemble an Atlantic 10 team.
snippet: It’s easy to fit the 12th-seeded Rams into the narrative of the plucky underdog, but in terms of facilities and money raised, they more closely resemble an Atlantic 10 team.
